about.name: Nico Foundas
about.subtitle: Freelance Senior Software Engineer
about.description: Passionate software engineer with expertise in full-stack development, project management, and DevOps. I help businesses build scalable, modern applications and optimize their development processes.

development.title: Development
development.description: Full-stack development with modern technologies and best practices.

projectManagement.title: Project Management
projectManagement.description: Agile methodologies and team leadership for successful project delivery.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: My professional journey and key projects that shaped my expertise in software development.

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform Modernization
projects.description: Led the complete modernization of a legacy e-commerce platform, migrating from monolithic architecture to microservices. Improved performance by 300% and reduced deployment time by 80%.

projects.title: Financial Dashboard Application
projects.description: Developed a real-time financial dashboard for portfolio management with advanced analytics and reporting features. Served over 10,000 active users.

projects.title: Healthcare Management System
projects.description: Built a comprehensive healthcare management system with patient records, appointment scheduling, and billing integration. Ensured HIPAA compliance and data security.

projects.title: IoT Monitoring Platform
projects.description: Created an IoT monitoring platform for industrial equipment with real-time data visualization and predictive maintenance alerts. Reduced downtime by 45%.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Ready to start your next project? Let's discuss how I can help bring your ideas to life.
contact.infoText: I'm always interested in new opportunities and exciting projects. Feel free to reach out!
